mechanics.condition: Creature is within a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range
mechanics.outcome: Creature must make a Dexterity saving throw
Creature takes 4d6 fire damage AND 4d6 radiant damage

mechanics.condition: Creature succeeds on the saving throw
mechanics.outcome: Creature takes half of 4d6 fire damage AND half of 4d6 radiant damage

description_text: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range must make a dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 fire damage and 4d6 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
